install_from: VM to install from. If public IP is set use FQDN, otherwise use this value. Can be left empty when running local scripts only
proximity_placement_group_name: name of the proximity placement group to create and join resources to
resource_group: resource group name to create resources in

vnet.name: vnet name - If it exists it has to be in a different resource groups than the resources deployed
vnet.resource_group: vnet resource group when specifying an existing vnet

peername1.resource_group: name of the resource group to peer the vnet to
peername1.vnet_name: name of the vnet to peer to

storagename.ad_username: User to use to join the domain
storagename.subnet: subnet name in which to inject ANF NICs

pool1.size: Total pool size in TB. 4 to 100

vmName1.availability_zones: 1,2,3 - Cannot be empty, can be removed
vmName1.image: For a public image use format OpenLogic:CentOS:7.7:latest ; For a custom image use the imageID of a managed image
vmName1.instances: Number of VMs to create; default is 1
vmName1.os_disk_size: OS Disk size in GB. This is only needed if you want to use a non default size or increase the OS disk size
vmName1.password: user admin password to use with Windows
vmName1.subnet: subnet name to create the VMs in
vmName1.storage_cache: None, (ReadWrite), ReadOnly - Only used for datadisks

vmssName1.availability_zones: 1,2,3 - Cannot be empty, can be removed
vmssName1.image: For a public image use format OpenLogic:CentOS:7.7:latest ; For a custom image use the imageID of a managed image
vmssName1.instances: Number of VMs to create in the VMSS
vmssName1.os_disk_size: OS Disk size in GB. This is only needed if you want to use a non default size or increase the OS disk size
vmssName1.password: user admin password to use with Windows
vmssName1.subnet: subnet name to create the VMs in
vmssName1.storage_cache: None, (ReadWrite), ReadOnly - Only used for datadisks
